casebody.data:
Joseph Michael LADEAIROUS, petitioner,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE. No. 18-7980. Supreme Court of the United States April 15, 2019.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari dismissed. See Rule 39.8.

*1564Justice KAVANAUGH took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition.
